thread.title: Kiran Rao can’t stop gushing over Kareena Kapoor Khan’s ramp walk at the Lakme Fashion Week Summer/Resort 2017
thread.title_full: Kiran Rao can’t stop gushing over Kareena Kapoor Khan’s ramp walk at the Lakme Fashion Week Summer/Resort 2017

author: Snehal Rajani
title: Kiran Rao can’t stop gushing over Kareena Kapoor Khan’s ramp walk at the Lakme Fashion Week Summer/Resort 2017
text:
Kareena Kapoor Khan parties hard with hubby Saif Ali Khan and her gang at Karan Johar’s residence 
Kareena Kapoor Khan grabbed many eyeballs everytime she stepped out with that baby bump. Now that Kareena has delivered last month, people just cannot help but still talk about how the actress broke all stereotypes. At the Lakme Fashion Week Summer/Resprt 2017 today, Aamir Khan’s wife Kiran Rao was asked to give her take on the same. On Kareena breaking stereotypes, Kiran said, “I love Kareena. She is great and I am looking forward to what she does at the fashion week this time around.” Absolutely, we second that! Well, it’s not just you Kiran, but we too are eagerly waiting to see how Bebo will set the ramp on fire this time. Remember the last time she walked the ramp was for Sabyasachi? She looked MAJESTIC in that outfit as she graced the stage with the baby bump. Kareena, if you are reading this, we just cannot wait to see you walk the ramp again. 
Ever since Taimur Ali Khan has been born, the actress is busy taking care of her baby. But that hasn’t kept her away from doing her usual things. Every other day Bebo is spotted with her girl gang going out to lunch dates and we must say, we quite like that! After pregnancy, her life has come back to normal.. I mean, isn’t that great? Not a lot of women are able to maintain a healthy balanace between their personal life and family life. Kareena and Kiran have always been the best of friends and for Kiran to have said such kind words for Kareena definitely mean a lot to the actress. (ALSO READ: Spotted: Kareena Kapoor Khan, Malaika Arora Khan and Karisma Kapoor looking divalicious – view HQ pics ) 
Coming back to the Lakme Fashion Week, Varun Dhawan walked the ramp for Kunal Rawal tonight and he looked dapper in a white embroidered outfit. Stay tuned as we will keep you posted with the latest updates on LFW 2017 right here on BollywoodLife!
